name: cardano-multiplatform-lib-cip25
description: Multiplatform SDK for CIP25 (Cardano NFT Metadata)

scripts.rust:build-nodejs: rimraf ./pkg; wasm-pack build --target=nodejs; npm run js:ts-json-gen; wasm-pack pack
scripts.rust:build-browser: rimraf ./pkg; wasm-pack build --target=browser; npm run js:ts-json-gen; wasm-pack pack
scripts.rust:build-web: rimraf ./pkg; wasm-pack build --target=web; npm run js:ts-json-gen; wasm-pack pack
scripts.js:prepublish: npm run rust:test && rimraf ./publish && cp -r ./pkg ./publish && cp README.md publish/ && cp LICENSE publish/
scripts.js:test-publish: npm run rust:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -nodejs && cd publish
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:prod: npm run rust:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -nodejs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-nodejs:beta: npm run rust:build-nodejs && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -nodejs && cd publish && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.js:publish-browser:prod: npm run rust:build-browser && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -browser && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-browser:beta: npm run rust:build-browser && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -browser && cd publish && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.js:publish-asm:prod: npm run rust:build-asm && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -asmjs && cd publish && npm publish --access public
scripts.js:publish-asm:beta: npm run rust:build-asm && npm run js:prepublish && node ../scripts/publish-helper cip25 cip25_wasm -asmjs && cd publish && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.js:ts-json-gen: cd json-gen && cargo +stable run && cd .. && node ../scripts/run-json2ts.js && node ../scripts/json-ts-types.js cip25_wasm
scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd binaryen; cmake . && make

hooks.pre-push: npm run rust:test && npm run rust:build-nodejs

author: dcSpark
